history.proof: intros. unfold ideal_leq in *. sfirstorder depth: 3use: poset_trans.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : poset P : T x, y, z : ideal P H : id_val x <== id_val y H0 : id_val y <== id_val z The term "y" has type "ideal P" while it is expected to have type "?y <== ?z".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold ideal_leq in *. apply (poset_trans _ y). apply H2. apply (poset_trans _ y). apply H1.
